title: David Rubenstein Examines The American Experiment
itunes:title: David Rubenstein Examines The American Experiment
description:
David Rubenstein, Co-Founder and Co-Executive Chairman of The Carlyle Group, discusses his new book “The American Experiment: Dialogues on a Dream.”

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
